full_description:
Rapoo S120 Neckband Bluetooth Earphone Black

Rapoo S120 is a Neckband Bluetooth Earphone. It comes in black colour. It is powered by Bluetooth 5.0 for wireless audio transmission. It features an Ergonomics design. It supports an iOS battery level display. It has a soft TPE cable and it is very comfortable to wear. The Rapoo S120 Neckband Bluetooth Earphone waterproof and sweat-proof. It is anti twining. It can support up to 7 hours of continuous play. It is a fashionable magnetic aluminium alloy voice cavity Bluetooth headset. It has 06 months warranty.
